title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
itunes:title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
description:
On today's edition of The Dan Patrick Show, DP recaps the US Open. Senior NFL Reporter  Albert Breer joins the program to talk about where Baker Mayfield may end up and gives us an update on the Deshuan Watson situation. How many games does he see him getting suspended for?

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
